title: Markets, Energy, And Esports (Podcast
itunes:title: Markets, Energy, And Esports (Podcast
description:
Chris Harvey, Head of Equity Strategy at Wells Fargo, discusses investing and the economy amid rising inflation and geopolitical tensions. Angie Gildea, KPMG US Energy Sector Leader, discusses rising oil prices and energy outlook in 2022. David Dietze, Managing Principal and Senior Portfolio Manager at Gladstone Bank, discusses markets, investing, and gives his 2022 economic outlook. Grant Johnson, Esports Entertainment Group CEO, discusses his company, sports video games, and sports gambling. Hosted by Paul Sweeney and Matt Miller.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
